title: RIOT LIED.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Seriously though, I wish my client wouldn't invent reasons to make me download the patch again.

replies.body:
We had a patch today, [Notes ](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-724b-notes)here!  Are you running into any issues, or is everything okay now?  

So, I'm not aware of what the service status page means about no download required.  :/  I'm guessing that it may have patched while offline or a quick hotfix.  I'll look to get more info on that!

Oh man i thought something was wrong when my 3G connection took so long to download .3MB .. guess i have to go to my neighbour and ask for his Wlan again :( 
(I really hate asking favor of off people)
